languages.text: Each enemy the psyker kills with a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} from the telepathy discipline permanently increases the effective power level of all telepathy discipline staves this character wields by +1.
languages.original_text: При каждом убийстве противника с помощью {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} телепатии, псайкер бессрочно повышает фактический уровень всех своих посохов телепатии на 1.

traits.locale_text:
Each enemy the psyker kills with a psychic power from the telepathy discipline permanently increases the effective power level of all telepathy discipline staves this character wields by +1.
Telepathy now affects necrons.

Each enemy the psyker kills with a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} from the telepathy discipline permanently increases the effective power level of all telepathy discipline staves this character wields by +1.

Each enemy the psyker kills with a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} from the telepathy discipline permanently increases the effective power level of all telepathy discipline staves this character wields by +1.

Each enemy the psyker kills with a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} from the telepathy discipline permanently increases the effective power level of all telepathy discipline staves this character wields by +1.

languages.text: 每当灵能者使用心灵感应系的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}杀死一名敌人时，该名角色使用的所有心灵感应法杖的有效力量等级都会提高1级。
languages.original_text: Each enemy the psyker kills with a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} from the telepathy discipline permanently increases the effective power level of all telepathy discipline staves this character wields by +1.

traits.locale_text:
每当灵能者使用心灵感应系的灵能者力量杀死一名敌人时，该名角色使用的所有心灵感应法杖的有效力量等级都会提高1级。
心灵感应能力同样会对太空死灵生效。
每当灵能者使用心灵感应系的灵能者力量杀死一名敌人时，该名角色使用的所有心灵感应法杖的有效力量等级都会提高1级。

languages.text: 異能者がテレパシー体系の{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}を使用して敵を倒すごとに、このキャラクターが使用する全てのテレパシー体系の杖の有効パワーレベルが永続的に1増加する。
languages.original_text: Each enemy the psyker kills with a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} from the telepathy discipline permanently increases the effective power level of all telepathy discipline staves this character wields by +1.

traits.locale_text:
異能者がテレパシー体系の超能力を使用して敵を倒すごとに、このキャラクターが使用する全てのテレパシー体系の杖の有効パワーレベルが永続的に1増加する。
テレパシーがネクロンに影響を及ぼすようになる。
異能者がテレパシー体系の{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}を使用して敵を倒すごとに、このキャラクターが使用する全てのテレパシー体系の杖の有効パワーレベルが永続的に1増加する。

languages.text: Cada enemigo que el psíquico mate con un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} de la disciplina telepatía aumenta permanentemente el nivel de poder efectivo de todos los báculos de la disciplina telepatía que use el personaje en +1.
languages.original_text: Each enemy the psyker kills with a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} from the telepathy discipline permanently increases the effective power level of all telepathy discipline staves this character wields by +1.

traits.locale_text:
Cada enemigo que el psíquico mate con un poder psíquico de la disciplina telepatía aumenta permanentemente el nivel de poder efectivo de todos los báculos de la disciplina telepatía que use el personaje en +1.
La telepatía ahora afecta a los necrones.

Cada enemigo que el psíquico mate con un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} de la disciplina telepatía aumenta permanentemente el nivel de poder efectivo de todos los báculos de la disciplina telepatía que use el personaje en +1.

languages.original_text: Each enemy the psyker kills with a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} from the telepathy discipline permanently increases the effective power level of all telepathy discipline staves this character wields by +1.

traits.locale_text:
При каждом убийстве противника с помощью психосилы телепатии, псайкер бессрочно повышает фактический уровень всех своих посохов телепатии на 1.
Также телепатия действует на некронов.

Также телепатия действует на некронов.

languages.text: Jeder Gegner, den der Psioniker mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kraft{/g} aus der Disziplin Telepathie tötet, erhöht dauerhaft die effektive Energiestufe aller Stäbe der Disziplin Telepathie, die dieser Charakter führt, um +1.
languages.original_text: Each enemy the psyker kills with a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} from the telepathy discipline permanently increases the effective power level of all telepathy discipline staves this character wields by +1.

traits.locale_text:
Jeder Gegner, den der Psioniker mit einer psionischen Kraft aus der Disziplin Telepathie tötet, erhöht dauerhaft die effektive Energiestufe aller Stäbe der Disziplin Telepathie, die dieser Charakter führt, um +1.
Telepathie wirkt jetzt auf Necrons.

Jeder Gegner, den der Psioniker mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kraft{/g} aus der Disziplin Telepathie tötet, erhöht dauerhaft die effektive Energiestufe aller Stäbe der Disziplin Telepathie, die dieser Charakter führt, um +1.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le psyker élimine un ennemi à l'aide d'un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} de la discipline Télépathie, le niveau de puissance efficace de tous les bâtons de cette discipline qu'il utilise augmente de façon permanente de +1.
languages.original_text: Each enemy the psyker kills with a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} from the telepathy discipline permanently increases the effective power level of all telepathy discipline staves this character wields by +1.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois que le psyker élimine un ennemi à l'aide d'un pouvoir psychique de la discipline Télépathie, le niveau de puissance effective de tous les bâtons de cette discipline qu'il utilise augmente de façon permanente de +1.
La Télépathie affecte désormais les Nécrons.

Chaque fois que le psyker élimine un ennemi à l'aide d'un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} de la discipline Télépathie, le niveau de puissance effective de tous les bâtons de cette discipline qu'il utilise augmente de façon permanente de +1.

languages.text: Ruhsezerin telepati disiplininden bir {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücüyle{/g} öldürdüğü her düşman, bu karakterin kullandığı tüm telepati disiplini asalarının etkili güç seviyesini kalıcı olarak 1 artırır.
